messages.content:
Subject: Invitation to Discuss AI Ethics & Digital Sovereignty on FutureTech Policy

Hi Dr. Martinez,

I’m Alex Rivera, host of the "FutureTech Policy" podcast. Our listeners are deeply interested in the intersection of technology and public policy—especially topics like AI ethics, digital sovereignty, and emerging regulatory frameworks.

Given your work as Senior Advisor for Emerging Technologies at the OSTP and your recent report on AI ethics (which resonated widely across our audience), I’d be thrilled to feature you in an upcoming episode titled "The Future of AI Ethics and Digital Sovereignty." The conversation would explore:
- The latest OSTP initiatives on AI governance.
- How digital sovereignty is shaping global tech policy.
- Practical implications for innovators and policymakers.

Our recent episodes on AI regulation, data privacy, and cybersecurity have attracted over 30,000 downloads, with 68% of listeners indicating a strong interest in AI ethics and digital sovereignty (see attached analytics).

Would you be available for a 45‑minute interview in the next two weeks? We can record remotely at a time that works best for you.

Thank you for considering this invitation. I look forward to the possibility of sharing your insights with our audience.

Best regards,
Alex Rivera
Host, FutureTech Policy
alex@futuretechpolicy.com
Twitter: @FutureTechPod
Here’s the ready‑to‑send email pitch for Dr. Sofia Martinez. Let me know if you’d like any tweaks or if you’d prefer to reach out to another candidate from the ranked list.
